participant_1.background:
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
My parents are my heroes.

participant_2.background:
I care more about my children than social media.
I'm not rich, but I enjoy traveling with my dog.
My social media life is pretty low-key, because I'm more focused on my studies.
i am deathly terrified of heights.
I enjoy trying new foods, but my favorite dishes are usually simple and comforting.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How is your day going?
It's going well, thank you! I'm just relaxing at home with my dog, and I'm trying to decide what to have for dinner.
Sounds nice! I'm at work, but I'm actually looking forward to going home and relaxing with my dog. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a goldendoodle named Bailey. She's the best dog ever!
Aw, I love goldendoodles! They're so cute and fluffy. I have a shih tzu named Toby. He's a little ball of energy.
Toby sounds adorable! I'm sure he's a great companion.
He is! He's always there to greet me at the door when I get home from work.
That's so sweet! I love it when dogs are excited to see their owners.
Me too! It's the best feeling.
I'm starting to think I'm hungry now. What are you thinking of having for dinner?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about making some pasta.
That sounds good! I love pasta.
Me too! I think I'm going to make a simple tomato sauce with some grilled chicken.
That sounds delicious! I might have to steal your idea for dinner tonight.
Go for it! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks! I think I will.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
Me too! Have a great day at work!
You too! Thanks!
